name: GitHubReleasePublish
description: Create or modify GitHub Release, allowing to upload assets, check manifest content and more.
author: Marcelo Forment√£o

inputs.name: githubEndpoint
inputs.label: GitHub Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Select the service endpoint for your GitHub connection.
To create one, click the Manage link and create a new service endpoint.

inputs.name: githubRepository
inputs.label: Repository
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Name of the GitHub repository.
If empty, it will be extracted from package.json (the repository.url field).

inputs.name: githubTag
inputs.label: Tag
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Tag to release, value should be v$(Build.BuildNumber) for release current build, for example: v1.0.0.
If empty, the version will be extracted from package.json and prepended by a 'v'.

inputs.name: githubReleaseTitle
inputs.label: Release Title
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Release title.
If empty, it will be the same as the tag.

inputs.name: githubReleaseNotes
inputs.label: Release Notes
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Release notes.
If missing it will be left undefined.

inputs.name: githubReleaseDraft
inputs.label: Draft
inputs.helpMarkDown: Release tagged as Draft. Uncheck this and pre-release to have a release tag.

inputs.name: githubReleasePrerelease
inputs.label: Pre Release
inputs.helpMarkDown: Release tagged as Pre-release. Uncheck this and draft to have a release tag.

inputs.name: githubIgnoreAssets
inputs.label: Ignore Assets
inputs.helpMarkDown: Skip uploading assets to this release.

inputs.name: githubReleaseAsset
inputs.label: Files to Upload as Assets
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The file to upload as artifacts to the release. Minimatch patterns are supported.
For example: $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)/**/*.exe

inputs.name: manifestJson
inputs.label: Manifest JSON
inputs.helpMarkDown: File from which default values will be extracted if options are missing.

inputs.name: githubReuseRelease
inputs.label: Reuse Release
inputs.helpMarkDown: Allow to reuse a release with the same tag.

inputs.name: githubReuseDraftOnly
inputs.label: Reuse only Draft Release
inputs.helpMarkDown: Allow to only reuse a release if it's draft. Prevents you from editing already published releases.

inputs.name: githubSkipDuplicatedAssets
inputs.label: Skip Duplicated Assets
inputs.helpMarkDown: Prevents the plugin to replace assets with the same name.

inputs.name: githubTargetCommitsh
inputs.label: Target Commitsh
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specifies the commitish value that determines where the Git tag is created from. Can be any branch or commit SHA.
Defaults to the default branch of the repository.

inputs.name: githubApiUrl
inputs.label: API URL
inputs.helpMarkDown:
You can use a custom API URL to connect to GitHub Enterprise instead of github.com.
Defaults to 'https://api.github.com'.
